page.title: 11Norprint
page.content: We wrote to the manger of {Norprint} to ask if we could interview him.When we got our reply we aranged to go.When we got there we waited for 5 minutes. We interviewed {Mr Capaly} he said that the firm had three factories 2 in Boston and 1 in Humberside.10,350 people work in the factories the wage is Â£130.The three factories use each use 2 and a half million sq. metres of paper per year and{Â£30,000,000}in sales per year. {Norprint} is a factory which makes labels,wrapping paper,cardboard,boxes,stickylabels, squared paper and lined paper.With the profits of these{ Norprint}make printing machines.
